div.p: This sub-element is located in BIOGRAPHY OCCUPATION . It captures the names of a person's employers. We are interested in tracking if particular kinds of organizations and institutions that supported women's work or attracted women writers more than others. This element generally encloses just a NAME or ORGNAME, though it may enclose a few words (a series of department stores).

div.codeblock: MS was a tutor at <EMPLOYER><ORGNAME>Manchester University</ORGNAME></EMPLOYER>.

div.p: An ORGNAME element must be placed around employers that are organizations.
A Name element must be placed around all employers who are individuals.
